Try this: go to "C:Documents and Settings[user name]My DocumentsMy GamesUnrealEngine3RemembermeGameConfig" and open  "ExampleAdriftGfxConfig"
change "Full screen" to False. works to me.

Failed to create d3d9.....

Try this: go to "C:Documents and Settings[user name]My Documents/My Games/UnrealEngine3/RemembermeGame/Config" and open "ExampleAdriftGfxConfig"
change "Full screen" to False. works to me.

Seeded 15 GB. Thanks! Fantastic game. Works great. 

It has some BS boss fights, but other than that, great parkour/melee fighting game. I recommend it.

**IF YOU CAN'T SEE MENU TEXT**  

If you are using NVIDIA card like I am go to nvidia control panel, on the left click manage 3d settings, on the right click program settings and select remember me program from the drop down list, find antialiasing - mode and set it to off.  This will turn off antialiasing for remember me only and should fix the problem.  It worked for me.
LOOOOOOOOOL  after reading install physX and stuff i installed it then it still didn't work then i uninstalled it and the game WORKED LOOOOOOOOOOL I laughed my ass off

If anyone is getting this message : Can't start because MSVCP100.dll is missing. what you need to do is go to where you have installed Remember me,
Open _CommonRedist then vcredist. Now you can either do both or just the one, it doesn't really matter which one you go into. Open either 2008 or 2010 and open the x64 and repair, do the same with x86.

After that you should be able to run the game perfectly.

I hope this helps

cheers

Find ExampleAdriftGfxConfig.ini in documents/mygames/unrealengine3/remembermegame/config , and change ResWidth and ResHeight to resolution of you screen
